code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import BookCard from"../components/BookCard";import"../Styles/PaginaPrincipal.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function PaginaPrincipal(){const[libros,setLibros]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetch("http://localhost:5072/api/Libros").then(res=>{if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Error en la respuesta del servidor");return res.json();}).then(data=>{setLibros(data);setLoading(false);}).catch(err=>{console.error("Error al obtener libros:",err);setLoading(false);});},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"cargando",children:"Cargando libros..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("main",{className:"pagina-principal",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"titulo",children:"\uD83D\uDCDA Libros Disponibles"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid",children:libros.map(libro=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/libro/".concat(libro.id),className:"book-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BookCard,{title:libro.titulo,author:libro.autor,cover:libro.urlPortada})},libro.id))})]});}
